Text: Warning: this is an .rar file.  You need 100% of the file to decompress/view (as far as I know - please correct if I am wrong, and point me to program that will allow decompression).  I sat at 547.71Mb (99.70%) for months waiting for the last 0.3%, but it never showed up, so I finally dumped it to make room on my hard drive.
